TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit InkAnnotationFlag extends DocumentFormat.OpenXml.OpenXmlLeafElement

summary.para: This class is available in Office 2007 and above.
When the object is serialized out as xml, it's qualified name is pvml:iscomment.

remarks.format:
## Remarks [!INCLUDE[openxmlnoticeiso](~/includes/openxmlnoticeiso.md)]
`iscomment (Ink Annotation Flag)`
Specifies that the object was created as an ink annotation. Default is *false*. If this element is specified without a value, it is assumed to be *true*. This element is only used with PresentationML. [*Rationale* This allows an application to treat annotation ink objects as any other annotation. For example, if annotations are hidden, the application can hide the ink object. *end rationale*]
[*Example:*
```xml <v:shape … > <o:ink … annotation="true"/> <pvml:iscomment/> </v:shape> ```
c696d1a7-426b-41fb-be66-e81e872642c4
*end example*]
|Parent Elements| |---------------------| |shape (§14.1.2.19)|
[*Note*: The W3C XML Schema definition of this element’s content model (CT_Empty) is located in §A.6.5. *end note*]
[!INCLUDE[openxmlnoticeiso](~/includes/openxmlcopyrightiso.md)]
